entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
